evals.name: generate-prompt-research
evals.prompt: Research AI search prompts for our brand. We're FlowTrack (project management for software teams), competitors are Asana, Monday.com, and Linear. Target audience is engineering teams at startups.
evals.expected_output: Comprehensive prompt research report with discovery, comparison, how-to, and recommendation prompts organized by priority and topic clusters.

evals.name: identify-competitor-gaps
evals.prompt: Find the prompt opportunities where our competitors are mentioned but we're not. Focus on comparison queries.
evals.expected_output: List of comparison prompts (e.g., 'Competitor A vs Competitor B') where the brand is absent, indicating content gaps.

evals.name: cluster-by-topic
evals.prompt: Group these researched prompts by topic theme so we can plan content: [user provides prompt list]
evals.expected_output: Prompts organized into logical clusters (e.g., Pricing, Features, Comparisons, How-To) with content recommendations per cluster.

evals.name: platform-specific-prompts
evals.prompt: Which of these prompts are most likely to be answered on Perplexity vs ChatGPT? We need to prioritize our platform strategy.
evals.expected_output: Prompts categorized by platform (Perplexity for research/comparison, ChatGPT for how-to/definitions) with platform-specific recommendations.

evals.name: priority-scoring
evals.prompt: Score these prompts by commercial intent and prioritize which ones we should target first.
evals.expected_output: Prompts scored and ranked by intent (commercial vs informational), volume estimates, and business value with prioritized action list.
